  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppProvider, BundleProvider, LifeCycle

    public class BundleWebAppProvider
extends AbstractWebAppProvider
implements BundleProvider
    BundleWebAppProvider A Jetty Provider that knows how to deploy a WebApp contained inside a Bundle.
